summary: Iteration 3 backend testing: 17/17 tests passed. All 3 new features verified: (1) async chatbot via asyncio.create_task returns webhook immediately, (2) MongoDB TTL+text indexes exist, (3) /search command works. Backend logs confirm full chatbot pipeline: sendChatAction → DDG search → LLM call → sendMessage all execute successfully in background.

minor.issue: DDG returns 0 results (bot detection, 202 Accepted for automated requests). Chatbot still responds via LLM general knowledge — by design, but search grounding is effectively absent in this environment.

critical_code_review_comments: asyncio.create_task in webhook handler is correct for non-blocking behavior, but if the FastAPI process restarts mid-task, the background task will be silently dropped. Consider BackgroundTasks or a persistent queue for production.
DDG bot-detection (0 results) means chatbot answers only from LLM general knowledge — no real-time search grounding. This is a known environment constraint but worth monitoring.
